metadata.title: Instant Pot Super Easy Kinnathappam | Steamed Rice & Coconut Milk Cake | South Indian Dessert Recipe
metadata.description:
Kinnathappam or steamed rice coconut milk cake, an authentic South Indian dessert made in the Instant Pot. The beauty about this dessert is it's so simple & humble, made with easy ingredients yet tastes incredible. It's soft & melts into the mouth. This is a Thiruvithamcode specialty dessert (a town in Kanyakumari district, Tamil Nadu).

Ingredients:
Basmati rice- 1 cup
Egg- 1
Sugar- 1 cup
Thin coconut milk- 1 cup
Water- 1½ cups
Cumin seeds- ½ tsp
Whole cardamom, crushed- 2
Ghee- 2 tbsp
